def add(*args):
    return int(round(sum(float(a) / i for (i, a) in enumerate(args, 1))))

def add(*args):
    return round(sum(x / i for i, x in enumerate(args, 1)))
add = lambda *a: round(sum(e/i for i,e in enumerate(a,1)))

def add(*args):  
    return round(sum([args[i]/(i + 1) for i in range(len(args))]))

def add(*args):
  return round(sum( v / i for i, v in enumerate(args, 1) ))

def add(*args):
    return round(sum(x/(c+1) for c,x in enumerate(args)))

def add(*args):
    return round(sum(value / pos for pos, value in enumerate(args, 1)))

def add(*args):
    return round(sum(1.0 * n / i for i, n in enumerate(args, 1)))

def add(*args):
    return round(sum(args[i]/(i+1) for i in range(len(args))))
